flawed_nl_solution:
40% of the class is boys because 100-60=<<100-60=40>>40
There are 10 boys because 25x.4=<<25*.4=10>>10
60% of the boys don't like playing basketball because 100-40=<<100-40=90>>90
6 boys don't like playing basketball because 10x.6=9
12 girls like playing basketball because 9x2=<<9*2=18>>18
There are 15 girls in the class because 25-10=<<25-10=15>>15
80% of the girls in class like playing basketball because 18/15=<<18/15=1.2>>1.2
#### 1.2

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 90. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
